sentences.en: Another is the way that bad news comes and drabs, rather than in one cathartic revelation.
sentences.cn: 另外是坏消息是一点点出来的, 而不是一股脑都显现出来.

sentences.en: Antidote for overdose application: emetic , cathartic, alkalescent foods and beverages.
sentences.cn: 服用过量时所需用的解毒剂： 催吐， 泻药， 弱碱性食品、饮料。

sentences.en: Antidote for overdose application: emetic, cathartic, alkalescent foods and beverages.
sentences.cn: 服用过量时所需用的解毒剂: 催吐, 泻药, 弱碱性食品、饮料.

sentences.en: Ask or call your surgeon before taking a cathartic.
sentences.cn: 在使用通便药之前,要向医生询问.

sentences.en: Methods A cathartic colon animal modal was established using rhubarb and phenolphthalein in rats.
sentences.cn: 方法应用大黄和酚酞建立大鼠泻剂结肠模型,采用墨汁推进实验测定大鼠肠道传输功能.

sentences.en: That would inoculate the new owners from ridicule a cathartic demolition for the Country Club set.
sentences.cn: 这样,新主人就可以免遭奚落,乡村俱乐部也可以省心.

sentences.en: The drug had a cathartic effect.
To be taken orally can use as cathartic, stomachic tonic.
sentences.cn: 内服可用作泻药 、 健胃药等.

sentences.en: To get it all out in the open could be highly satisfying and cathartic.
sentences.cn: 把事情说开会令人心情舒畅,有很好的宣泄作用.

words.tran_cn: [医] 泻法，导泻；净化；精神发泄

trans.tran_cn: 起到发泄作用的，宣泄情绪的，（多指药）导泻的
